channel.title: WE ARE BACK! l GENERATIONX l SPAWN #1
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/zjvwop.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/fnwuvd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zvlg9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/10z0ch4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5ufz0h.jpg[/img]
GenerationX is back with the original GenerationX spawn source!
After a long time of bug fixes, rebuilding, the staff finally decided to release the server to public!
Why play GenerationX?
- Bounty Target System. - Active Wilderness. - Awarding Dangerous PvM. - Free-For-All minigame. - Play with oldschool/newschool graphics. - Stable economy. - Duel Arena with a new exchanging economy system coming soon. - Stable pure pking. - Pk Skill ; Get pk levels by killing people to wear the greatest items!. - Free Arnadyl Godsword!. - Elite Void effect. Ring of vigour, Berserker Ring (i). - Korasi's Sword! - New owners & actually caring about the players. - Hosted on a dedicated server,13GB ram in germany. - And a lot more!
Join us today!
[u]Play Now Webclient[/u] [url=http://generationx-pk.net/play.php]GenerationX[/url] [u]Download desktop Client[/u] [url=http://generationx-pk.net/desktopgx.zip]http://generationx-pk.net/desktopgx.zip[/url] [u]Forums (vBulletin) very active[/u] [url=http://generationx-pk.net/vb/portal.php]GenerationX Dedicated to perfection[/url] [u]Homepage[/u] [url=http://generationx-pk.net/]GenerationX[/url]
[u]Videos[/u] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fnk_zuzpUkQ[/youtube] [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hyS6gYlB72o][/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zjehwk7_Nb8[/youtube]
Please Note-I do not own this server, I am just an old veteran. I have been playing the server for 22 months. Owners: Jony & Grant. Thank you for your cooperation. [/CENTER]

GenerationX is back with the original GenerationX spawn source!

After a long time of bug fixes, rebuilding, the staff finally decided to release the server to public!

Why play GenerationX?
